title: PLD Space completes static-fire tests of Miura 1
summary: PLD Space, a Spanish company developing a small launch vehicle, says it is ready to proceed with the launch of a suborbital technology demonstrator after completing a static-fire test.

title: EarthDaily constellation built for change-detection analysis
summary: While much of the Earth-observation industry is seeking higher imagery resolution, EarthDaily Analytics is focused instead on gathering high-quality imagery that can be quickly analyzed to detect change.

title: Congress asks for more transparency into New Shepard failure investigation
summary: Leaders of the House space subcommittee have asked the Federal Aviation Administration for more details on its investigation into a Blue Origin New Shepard launch accident.

title: SpaceX rolls out “high-performance” satellite internet for residential users
summary: Back in February, SpaceX introduced a high-performance satellite internet solution that was specifically designed for businesses. The higher-tier kit is a step...

title: Rocket Lab launches Japanese radar imaging satellite on 30th Electron mission
summary: Rocket Lab successfully launched a Japanese radar imaging satellite Sept. 15 as the company prepares for another attempt to recover and reuse a booster.
